I'm trying to be specific regarding the abstract type of a struct. For instance,
```struct A{R,N} <: AbstractVector{<:AbstractArray{R,N}} end```
fails, so I'd need to know exactly what to put inside the `<: AbstractVector{...}` part, which will be dependent in that kind of way on one of my `struct` arguments.
